results.title: Trump-backed mining firm American Bitcoin hits Nasdaq with $1.5 B valuation
results.description: American Bitcoin Corp, backed by Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr., debuted on Nasdaq. Shares soared to $14.52 then closed at $8.04, valuing their 20% stake at over $1.5 billion.

results.title: From coins to miners: Trump family expands deep into crypto sector
results.description: The Trump family’s crypto ventures span token launches, mining operations, stablecoins, memecoins and plans for crypto ETFs, intensifying scrutiny over conflicts of interest.

results.title: AI expansions fuel rallies for Bitcoin miners Iren and Cipher Mining
results.description: Iren (formerly Iris Energy) and Cipher Mining stocks surged as they pivot into AI, expanding GPU capacity and launching new data centers blending bitcoin mining with AI compute.

results.title: CFTC grants Polymarket relief; DeFi lending up 72% this year
results.description: The CFTC granted regulatory relief to Polymarket, while institutional demand has driven a 72% growth in DeFi lending this year.

results.title: Crypto exchange OKX fined €2.25M for operating in Netherlands without approval
results.description: The Dutch central bank fined OKX €2.25 million for offering services in the Netherlands without regulatory approval.

results.title: Venezuela allows USDT usage in private sector amid dollar shortages
results.description: With U.S. dollar scarcity, Venezuela increasingly permits USDT (Tether) in private-sector currency exchanges; businesses, including PDVSA, are shifting to crypto for payments.

results.title: American Bitcoin, backed by Trump sons, aims to start trading in September
results.description: American Bitcoin, a Bitcoin-mining company backed by Eric and Donald Trump Jr., is set to begin trading on Nasdaq via an all-stock merger with Gryphon Digital Mining under ticker ABTC.

results.title: Businesses Absorb BTC at Four Times Daily Miner Supply, Says River’s Research
results.description: River’s flow-map shows corporate Bitcoin inflows are near four times the rate of new miner supply, suggesting strong institutional demand.

results.title: Iren (Bitcoin Miner) Jumps 15% After Earnings and Nvidia Partner Status
results.description: Iren (formerly Iris Energy) saw its stock surge 15% after strong Q4 earnings and new status as an Nvidia preferred partner; it expanded mining capacity to 50 EH/s and added thousands of GPUs.

results.title: Community Near Texas Bitcoin Mine Pushes to Incorporate Over Noise Concerns
results.description: Residents near a MARA-operated Bitcoin mine in Texas hope to incorporate their community as-Mitchell Bend to enact stricter noise regulations, citing 24/7 drone noise despite mitigation efforts.

results.title: “No question Bitcoin hits $1M" — Eric Trump at BTC Asia 2025
results.description: Eric Trump, co-founder of American Bitcoin, said at the Bitcoin 2025 Asia conference that there is “no question” BTC will reach $1 million in the coming years.

results.title: Asia Morning Briefing: ETH Bulls Eyeing $5K as Flows Strengthen
results.description: Ethereum outperforms bitcoin as institutional inflows build; traders watch for a test of $5,000 with macro data ahead.

results.title: Crypto Markets Today: BTC Price Underperforms Ether; CRO Surges on Trump-Linked News
results.description: Bitcoin lagged ether while Cronos (CRO) outperformed on Trump-linked developments; volumes swelled as BTC and ETH hovered near key supports.

results.title: Ethereum Tops $4,900 to New All-Time High
results.description: Ether cleared $4,900 for the first time, entering price discovery amid shrinking exchange reserves and strong demand.

results.title: Bitcoin Hits Fresh Record on Fed Easing Bets
results.description: Bitcoin set another record in mid-August as bets on Federal Reserve easing and institutional demand supported prices.

results.title: Bitcoin Traders Eye Upside as BTC Holds Above $110K
results.description: Day-ahead outlook notes BTC basing above $110K as bulls look to break out into month end.

results.title: Bitcoin, XRP, and Ethereum Gain: 2 Ways Trump Is Boosting Cryptos
results.description: Macro hopes for lower rates and a Trump Media–Crypto.com deal around CRO helped lift major tokens, led by Cronos.

results.title: Analyst: SOL’s Powerful Rally Warrants Caution
results.description: Popular traders say Solana’s strength is notable but advise profit-taking near $205–$215 or waiting for clearer signals.

results.title: Cardano Gains as Market Bets on Rate Cuts Despite ETF Delay
results.description: ADA climbed on Aug 27 as traders looked past an ETF pause and positioned for potential Fed cuts.

results.title: XRP Jumps to Top Market Gainers; Futures OI Tops $1B
results.description: XRP led a broad crypto rebound, with CME futures OI crossing $1B as traders returned after a sell-off.

results.title: SEC Delays Multiple XRP ETF Decisions; Price Tests $2.90 Support
results.description: The SEC postponed rulings on several spot XRP ETFs until October, pressuring price into a key support zone.

results.title: Dogecoin Jumps to $0.21 Despite $200M Whale Transfer to Binance
results.description: DOGE weathered heavy whale flows to Binance and held near $0.21 after high-volume swings.

results.title: REX-Osprey Seeks SEC Approval for BNB Staking ETF
results.description: REX-Osprey filed for a BNB staking ETF, following the path set by recent Solana fund efforts.

results.title: BNB Climbs Above $810 as Buyers Target $815 Resistance
results.description: BNB pressed toward resistance with talk of institutional accumulation and rising volumes.

results.title: Toncoin Extends Rally as Telegram Launches Integrated TON Wallet for U.S. Users
results.description: Telegram’s rollout of TON wallet to U.S. users boosted Toncoin’s adoption and price momentum.

results.title: Kaspa Trapped in $0.082–$0.095 Range Amid Mixed Forecasts
results.description: Kaspa held in a tight range as traders debated breakout odds and watched key levels.

results.title: Kaspa Mining 2025: IceRiver Highlights Low-Cost Hosting as Key to ROI
results.description: IceRiver notes rising Kaspa difficulty and stresses low-cost, high-uptime power for KS5L/KS3M class ASICs to stay profitable.

results.title: Bitcoin Miners Say Times Are ‘Grim’ as Fee Drought Threatens Network
results.description: With transaction fees slumping, some miners warn of existential pressures and consolidation risks.

results.title: The Protocol: Bitcoin Mining Faces New Challenges as Power Costs Eat Profit
results.description: Rising energy costs and a tighter post-halving environment are squeezing miner margins.

results.title: Bitcoin Miner IREN Doubles GPU Fleet With $193M Blackwell Purchase to Accelerate AI Pivot
results.description: IREN bought 4,200 additional NVIDIA Blackwell B200 GPUs, doubling its HPC fleet to 8,500 as it expands into AI cloud services.

results.title: Hut 8 Surges on Plan to Add 1.5 GW, Expanding to 19 Sites
results.description: Hut 8 outlined plans to more than double power capacity with four new U.S. sites, sending shares higher.

results.title: Bitmain Hosts Global Hydro-Cooling Tour Event in Texas
results.description: Bitmain held a global hydro-cooling tour stop in Texas, showcasing liquid-cooling solutions to large-scale miners.
